scripts.clean: docker compose -f docker-compose.handler.yml down; docker compose -f docker-compose.youth.yml down; docker compose -f docker-compose.employer.yml down; docker compose -f docker-compose.benefit.yml down; docker rm -f $(docker ps -a -q); docker volume rm $(docker volume ls -q)
scripts.benefit: cross-env COMPOSE_HTTP_TIMEOUT=200 docker compose -f docker-compose.benefit.yml up
scripts.employer: cross-env COMPOSE_HTTP_TIMEOUT=200 docker compose -f docker-compose.employer.yml up
scripts.handler: cross-env COMPOSE_HTTP_TIMEOUT=200 docker compose -f docker-compose.handler.yml up
scripts.youth: cross-env COMPOSE_HTTP_TIMEOUT=200 docker compose -f docker-compose.youth.yml up
scripts.tet-admin: cross-env COMPOSE_HTTP_TIMEOUT=200 docker compose -f docker-compose.tet-admin.yml up
scripts.tet-youth: cross-env COMPOSE_HTTP_TIMEOUT=200 docker compose -f docker-compose.tet-youth.yml up
